title: WOW! This brand new MacBook Air with Apple silicon is just $599
content:
Macworld

The M1 MacBook Air may be 4 years old, but we still love its retro good looks. And at this price, is worth real consideration even as a secondary backup laptop: Walmart is selling the M1 MacBook Air in silver, space gray, or gold for $599, a savings of $400 off the original MSRP and the best price we’ve ever seen for any Apple laptop.

The M1 MacBook Air has the classic wedge design with the original M1 processor (8-core CPU/7-core GPU) that’s still an incredible performer for everyday tasks like word processing and web browsing. You’ll get the whisper-quiet Air design with a gorgeous 13.3-inch retina display, a pair of Thunderbolt ports, and a fantastic Magic Keyboard with Touch ID. In our review, we praised the M1 Air’s performance, and four years later, it’s even ready to run Apple Intelligence with macOS Sequoia.

We’ve never seen a non-refurbished model for this cheap, so go grab one now before this Black Friday blowout goes poof.

The M1 MacBook Air is down to $599
Buy now at Walmart
